plugins.name: Team Calendars for Confluence

marketplaceType.toolTip: Evaluate and purchase this add-on through your MyAtlassian account.

compatibleApplications.name: Confluence
compatibleApplications.introduction: Confluence is the perfect tool for getting everyone on the same page. Create stunning visuals to explain your ideas, theme Confluence into a thing of beauty, or take advantage of powerful tools for technical writers. Whether your team is large or small, technical or Luddite, there's a Confluence add-on to get everyone in sync.

plugins.summary: Your team's single source of truth – managing team leave, tracking JIRA projects, and planning events – Team Calendars for Confluence connects Confluence and JIRA like never before.

compatibleApplications.introduction: Nice one! Your team went JIRA. You've got a best-in-class issue tracker, but that's only the beginning. plugins.name: Tempo Timesheets for JIRA

marketplaceType.toolTip: Evaluate and purchase this add-on through your MyAtlassian account.

version.releaseNotes:
In this version:

  • Various bugs in Tempo Scheduler fixed.
  • Workflow not visible in Diagram mode after installing Tempo Timesheet - fixed
  • ..... and more

A know regression in this version is reported in TT-3117

View Tempo Timesheets 7.16.5 Release Notes page for all details.

IMPORTANT reading for administrators are the Proactive Actions before Upgrade pages.

plugins.summary:
All your testing, inside JIRA. Finally! 

Zephyr for JIRA is an add-on
built for JIRA Server, DC and Cloud. It augments JIRA's
capabilities, providing cost-effective, highly sophisticated test
management right inside your JIRA instance.
